desc: Boosts BB Atk, hugely boosts BB gauge when damage dealt has exceeded certain amount & 30% boost to Atk, Def

dictionary.lore: A sphere made with a precious Material referred to as "the metal of fire." The metal has properties that cause it to emit magical power when struck. Noel processed it according to notes in an ancient text believed to have been written by Vandite, the "Artist of Flames" of ancient Grand Gaia. The development of the Frontier Gate is said to have made explosive progress thanks to the discovery of this immensely magical metal.

name: Magical Device
